books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Elizabeth George
books.description: Inspector Thomas Lynley’s investigation of a murder unearths the secrets of a wealthy clan.
books.name: BELIEVING THE LIE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In Volume 2 of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Jonathan Safran Foer
books.description: A 9-year-old boy searches New York City for the lock that fits a key belonging to his father, who died on Sept. 11.
books.name: EXTREMELY LOUD AND INCREDIBLY CLOSE

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Jack Morgan, the head of an investigative firm, is accused of murder.
books.name: PRIVATE: #1 SUSPECT

books.author: by Kresley Cole
books.description: A ruthless vampire captures a young mortal woman, intending to sacrifice her, but is torn when he falls in love.
books.name: LOTHAIRE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment is to stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: D.D. Warren, a Boston detective in her seventh month of pregnancy, faces unexpected dangers as a consultant on a film about a serial killer.
books.name: THE 7TH MONTH

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Partners in a small law firm take on a big case after a fast-track burnout joins them.
books.name: THE LITIGATORS

books.author: by Jayne Ann Krentz
books.description: Amy Radwell, who can understand the paranormal secrets in rare books, becomes the target of a blackmailer.
books.name: COPPER BEACH

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Alex Cross investigates when the president’s children are kidnapped, but the F.BI. and C.I.A. interfere.
books.name: KILL ALEX CROSS

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: Gideon Crew works to avoid a threatened terrorist attack on an American city.
books.name: GIDEON’S CORPSE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch of the L.A.P.D. uncovers both the operations of a sadistic killer and a political conspiracy.
books.name: THE DROP
